title: #493: The Best Fan-Made Harry Potter Merchandise
description:
• It's the holiday season, so we're discussing some great fan-made Harry Potter item with MuggleCast listener and Etsy creator Hannah, owner of Flighty Temptress Adventures!
  • Hannah shares her story of becoming a fan creator, product creation, her favorite item and the community overall
  • The hosts share some of the main reasons they support fan creators
  • How long will the market for fan-made Harry Potter items last?
  • Jewelry? Artwork? What fan-made products have the hosts purchased over the years?
  • Host recommendations: CrestCrossed (shirts, patches and more that merge the Hogwarts Houses), Cards Against Muggles, HeadBandz,  SouthCoasters (Harry Potter themed drink coasters), HollowBooks, AniaArtNL's House Banners, Diagon Alley watercolor print, Harry Potter AirPod cases, Book Page earrings and Art By Fox
  • Listener recommendations: Rogue Rose Gifts (knitted items including your very own Weasley sweater), Story Hero (protective book sleeves), Painted Book Edges, Almandol's Custom Mugs, Diagon Alley & Hogwarts Staircase Bookshelf Inserts, Snail Customs (custom Funkos), BriarWick Candles, Ultra Plush and Snuggly Harry Potter Lovey Security Blanket
  • Given the unprecedented food lines in the United States, this year, MuggleCast will be making a donation to No Kid Hungry. To find out more, visit nokidhungry.org.
  • Muggle Mail covers Hagrid and Harry's defining chapters
  • Quizzitch: What’s the first thing that Harry Potter buys in Diagon Alley?
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul
  • This week's episode is sponsored by ThirdLove (visit ThirdLove.com/mugglecast for 10% off your first purchase), BeachBody (text ‘mugglecast’ to 30-30-30 to receive a free trial!) and Usual Wines (Enter code "MuggleCast" for $8 off your first order and your first glass on us!)
  • Support us on Patreon and receive magical benefits, like Bonus MuggleCast! In Bonus MuggleCast, we'll be fantasy gifting each other some of the fan-made items we mentioned in the show and coming up with our own Harry Potter Etsy creations!
itunes:author: Harry Potter
